criteria.name: Completion of Tasks
criteria.description: Full Credit: All three tasks attempted (keyword analysis, STAR rewrite, interview reflection). Partial Credit: One task incomplete or missing detail. Minimal / No Credit: Multiple tasks missing.

criteria.name: Thoughtful Engagement
criteria.description: Full Credit: Shows genuine effort â€” reflects on skills, edits AI output, answers prompts thoughtfully. Partial Credit: Basic responses with limited reflection or personalization. Minimal / No Credit: Little effort or mostly copied AI output.

criteria.name: Clarity & Organization
criteria.description: Full Credit: Responses clear and readable. Partial Credit: Some unclear or disorganized parts. Minimal / No Credit: Hard to follow or very incomplete.
